home.title: Build, test, and demo the Fake Store API
home.subtitle: A Nuxt 4 playground that showcases fetching, creating, and managing products, carts, and users with a polished Tailwind UI.
home.previewCartSubtitle: Synced with your Fake Store account
home.previewHintDescription: Browse curated products, craft new listings, authenticate with demo accounts, and inspect customer profiles without leaving this experience.
home.featuredSubtitle: A snapshot of products fetched directly from the Fake Store API.

highlights.productsDescription: Filter, search, and inspect Fake Store products with instant SSR hydration.
highlights.cartDescription: Persist your selections with live API syncs for demo accounts.
highlights.usersDescription: Dive into member profiles and their historical orders.

products.title: Product catalogue
products.subtitle: Search, filter, and sort Fake Store products while adding items to your synced cart.

createProduct.title: Create a new product
createProduct.subtitle: Send a request to the Fake Store API and inspect the generated response.

cart.title: Shopping cart
cart.subtitle: Review your selections and sync them with Fake Store.

messages.loginRequired: Sign in with a demo account to sync carts.

cart.empty: Your cart is empty — start exploring products!

summary.title: Order summary
summary.note: All totals are illustrative for the Fake Store demo.

help.title: Need demo credentials?
help.description: Use the users explorer to pick a username and password for the Fake Store sandbox.

auth.title: Sign in to sync carts
auth.subtitle: Use any Fake Store demo credentials to test authentication and cart retrieval.
auth.helper: Use credentials from the Users page to experiment with the API.

users.title: Fake Store users
users.subtitle: Inspect demo accounts, their contact details, and recent orders.

userDetail.noOrders: No cart history available for this user yet.

footer.text: Built with Nuxt 4, Tailwind CSS, and the Fake Store API.
